subsection.name: 4.3 Reverse Engineer Database
subsection.p: Prerequisites. Start CayenneModeler and create a new project or open an existing one. Create DataNode with the target database connection info.
Start Reverse Engineering. On the left-hand side project tree select DataNode with connection information of the target database. Select "Tools -> Reengineer Database Schema" from the menu:
A dialog pops up that allows to specify alternative connection parameters. Click OK.

Select Schema And Table Name Pattern. Modeler will show a dialog allowing to limit the number of tables being processed. Table name pattern can be specified ("%" stands for match all table names). Also if a database supports schemas, one of the schemas can be selected. After clicking "OK", it may take Modeler from a few seconds to a few minutes to finish reengineering. After that a new DataMap will be created:
